---
title: "Data Import"
output: git_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df <- 
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update names in 'litters_df'.

```{r}
litters_df <- 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data!

```{r}
litters_df
```

Sometimes skimming data is neat

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df <-
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""), skip = 10) #skip 
```

Import pups data set 
```{r}
pups_df <-
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv", 
           skip = 3, 
           na = c("NA", ".", "")
           )

pups_df <-
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
